values.value: Calls Tooling API for a list of fields on a Tooling API type. Returns only the field names in the describe info. After calling this, call the decsribeDrilldown function to drilldown into one of the fields. (IMPORTANT: Do not use this function for information on SObjects accessible to the end user. For SObject information, run a Tooling SOQL query on 'EntityDefinition'. This method is more used to gather which type of fields you can query in a Tooling SOQL query)
